UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The antimicrobial peptide ZY4 combats multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Acinetobacter baumannii infection.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2019;116:26516-2622
Literature.Author: Mwangi J, Yin YL, Wang G, Yang M, Li Y, Zhang Z, Lai R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>320 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>320 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:3.1±1.2% Hemolysis=320 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:10% Killing=80 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:15% Killing=80 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.5µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=2µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MIC=1.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCC 10104(MIC=1.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=0.8-1.3µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CICC 22933(MIC=1.9µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=1.9µM)
